short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays all the badges earned at coderwall by a user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension quickly allows a user to view all of his/her Coderwall badges in Chrome. All the user needs to do is to enter his/her GitHub username, and wait for the badges to load. 

This is an unofficial extension developed by Vinit Kumar and Piper Chester.
